response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs and aspirations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to you, just like it does to us. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a highly competitive rate. I am confident that you will find this offer irresistible and hope that we can bring this exceptional product into your life soon. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 950000}
